item.title: Setting git up!
item.description: To Config git take the steps bellow and your basic git setup is done in minutes There are 3 levels of configurations Commands to edit each Settings level: git config --sytem <setting to edit> <setting value> git config --global <setting to edit> <setting value> git config --local <setting to edit> <setting value> Scope SYSTEMÂ : All Users of current computer GLOBAL: All repositories of current user LOCAL: The current Repository
